Privacy Policy

Last Updated: November 20, 2025

1. Introduction

Welcome to Better Text Pad ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your data. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our online code editor and text editing application.

2. Information We Collect

2.1 Local Storage Only

Better Text Pad operates entirely in your web browser using local storage. We do not collect, store, or transmit any of your data to our servers or any third-party servers.

2.2 Data Stored Locally

The following information is stored locally on your device:

  • Code and Text Content: All files, notes, and text you create or edit
  • Todo Lists: Your task lists and completion status
  • Notes: Personal notes and annotations
  • User Preferences: Theme settings (dark/light mode), editor configurations
  • Tab State: Open tabs and their contents
  • CSV Data: CSV files and their edits

2.3 No Server-Side Data Collection

We do NOT collect:

  • Personal identification information
  • Email addresses
  • IP addresses
  • Usage analytics or tracking data
  • Cookies (except those required for basic functionality)
  • Any content you create or edit

3. How We Use Your Information

Since all data is stored locally on your device:

  • Your data never leaves your browser
  • We have no access to your files, code, or personal information
  • All processing happens on your device
  • No data is transmitted to external servers

4. Data Storage and Security

4.1 Browser Local Storage

All application data is stored using your browser's local storage API. This means:

  • Data persists between browser sessions
  • Data is only accessible from the same browser and device
  • Clearing browser data will delete all stored information
  • Other websites cannot access your Better Text Pad data

4.2 Your Responsibility

As data is stored locally, you are responsible for:

  • Backing up important files (use download/export features)
  • Protecting your device and browser access
  • Managing browser storage settings

5. Third-Party Services

Better Text Pad does not integrate with any third-party services, analytics tools, or advertising networks. The application runs entirely client-side in your browser.

6. Cookies

We do not use cookies for tracking or advertising purposes. Any browser storage used is strictly for application functionality (saving your work, preferences, etc.).

7. Children's Privacy

Our service does not collect any personal information and is safe for users of all ages. Since we don't collect data, we are compliant with children's privacy protection regulations including COPPA.

8. Data Retention

Your data remains in your browser's local storage until:

  • You manually delete it within the application
  • You clear your browser's data/cache
  • You uninstall your browser
  • Your browser automatically cleans storage (based on browser settings)

9. Your Rights and Choices

Since all data is stored locally on your device, you have complete control:

  • Access: All your data is accessible within the application
  • Export: Use download features to export your work
  • Delete: Clear data within the application or browser settings
  • Control: Full control over what you create and store

10. International Users

Since Better Text Pad operates entirely in your browser without server communication, there are no international data transfers. Your data never leaves your device.

11. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

12. GDPR Compliance

Better Text Pad is compliant with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) because:

  • We don't collect or process personal data
  • No data is transferred to servers or third parties
  • Users have complete control over their data
  • No consent is required as no data is collected

13. California Privacy Rights (CCPA)

California residents have specific privacy rights. However, since Better Text Pad doesn't collect, sell, or share personal information, these rights are inherently protected by our privacy-first architecture.

14. Security

While we don't store your data on servers, we recommend:

  • Using secure, updated browsers
  • Keeping your device secure
  • Regularly backing up important work
  • Using device encryption if available

15. Open Source Transparency

Better Text Pad's code can be reviewed to verify our privacy claims. We believe in transparency and welcome security researchers to audit our application.

16. Contact Information

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or Better Text Pad's privacy practices, you can contact us at:

Email: privacy@bettertextpad.com
Website: https://bettertextpad.com

17. Data Breach Notification

Since we don't collect or store user data on servers, the risk of a data breach involving your personal information is eliminated. Your data security depends solely on your device and browser security.

18. Acceptance of This Policy

By using Better Text Pad, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.

Summary: Better Text Pad respects your privacy. We don't collect, store, or share your data. Everything stays on your device. You're in complete control.
